sentence: In early trading on Monday, shares of Walt Disney ( DIS ) topped the list of the day's best performing Dow Jones Industrial Average components, trading up 1.2%.
Year to date, Walt Disney registers a 13.1% gain.
And the worst performing Dow component thus far on the day is Procter & Gamble ( PG ), trading down 0.9%.
Procter & Gamble is lower by about 3.1% looking at the year to date performance.
Two other components making moves today are Travelers Companies ( TRV ), trading down 0.5%, and Caterpillar ( CAT ), trading up 1.0% on the day.
The views and opinions expressed herein are the views and opinions of the author and do not necessarily reflect those of Nasdaq, Inc.
